title: The Midnight Owl - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Mature   Mystery   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Adventurers   Animal Characteristics   Comedic Undertone   Cute Protagonist   Fantasy World   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Magical Space   Misunderstandings   Mysterious Past   Mystery Solving   Secret Crush   Survival
author: Yan Liang Yu   颜凉雨
description:
At midnight, with two hoots of owls, Xu Wang was involved in a world called “Owl”, dividing his life into two parts: “day reality” and “night mission completed”.

Xu Wang: I met my white moonlight, who I had a crush on in high school and who turned me down, now has become my team partner in the world of mission completed. I was very flustered.

Wu Sheng: I met the man who bore in my mind in mission completed world. Although I was rejected that year, I would like to try again.

Owl: Which one of you had a crush on the other? Who was turned down? How am I confused about this…

Sophomore, high IQ, pretentious adorable Gong VS optimistic ridicule Shou>
